# Preface {-}

```{r, include=FALSE}
options(tinytex.verbose = TRUE) #For debugging
library(medfate)
library(ggplot2)
```
This is a reference book for the models implemented in the R package **medfate**. This package provides functions for the simulation of functioning and dynamics of Mediterranean forests.
